Advisory:
Bodhi-server 2.2.0 addresses CVE-2016-1000008 by disallowing the re-use of solved captchas. Additionally, the captcha is warped to make it more difficult to solve through automation.

See: https://github.com/fedora-infra/bodhi/pull/857
And: https://github.com/fedora-infra/bodhi/commit/f0122855
